name: Osy Osmosis
description: Osy Osmosis is a fun game for all ages where you must help Osy stay safe as she navigates through her world collecting stars. To help Osy, you will use osmosis to keep her in balance with the world around her.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work. Storage: 300 MB available space
